name: Callisons Wintergreen Flavor N&A WS (111971)
description: Callisons Wintergreen Flavor N&A WS (111971) is a wintergreen flavoring agent. It is in a liquid state, appears colorless, and has a characteristic odor, which is typically associated with the wintergreen flavor. This flavor is used in various food and beverage applications to impart a refreshing and minty taste reminiscent of wintergreen.
